item.title: About Me
item.description: Me in some words .red { color: red; } .yellow { color: yellow; } I’m a Software Engineer with a keen interest in software architectures, I enjoy designing, building and optimizing systems developed from ground up, I enjoy it because I believe it could solve our problems, not all of them but most of them. During my carrier , I have weared many technical hats to diverse my experience and to have an overview of what software architectures and technical implementations should looks like in a world that never stop changing.

item.title: Everything the tool you need
item.description: Everything (Realtime filesystem indexing) Introduction Everything is a tool that query NTFS filesystem for any change that happen to any referenced device and provide a way to have control over you machine. the binary it self is no more than 2 megs. and it can change the way you interact with windows explorer forever. If you combine the tool with a hotkey you can decrease the use of windows explorer to 10%.
